overview: Contact page for Digital Experience Healthcare allowing users to view contact information and submit inquiries via a form. Includes success and error banners, accessibility features, and theme toggle.
key_components: Hero section with title and subtitle
Contact form (implied but not shown in snippet)
interactions: Click skip-to-content link to jump to main content
Submit contact form to trigger success or error banners
Dismiss success or error banners via close button
data_flow: User inputs data into contact form
On success, success-banner is shown and form cleared
On error, error-banner is shown with guidance
accessibility: ARIA roles on navigation and banners
analytics: Track form submission success and failure events
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link focuses main content
Test theme toggle updates visual theme and persists state
Submit form with valid data and assert success-banner visibility
Submit form with invalid data and assert error-banner visibility
Ensure banner close buttons hide respective banners
Check ARIA attributes and live regions announce correctly
Confirm analytics events fire on form submission and theme toggle
